title: Henry Catchpole
description:
Henry Catchpole was the Features Editor for EVO Magazine for 11 years and now hosts the YouTube channel, Carfection, which produces exceptional videos about important and iconic cars. He recently had quite a day, driving 3 icons: the McLaren F1, Mercedes CLK GTR, and Porsche GT1.
 

Use Off The Record! and ALWAYS fight your tickets! Enter code TST10 for a 10% discount on your first case on the Off The Record app, or go to https://off-the-record.sjv.io/c/2765520/1021446/13139 
 

Get your Dillon optics here: http://thesmokingtire.com/partners-1

Follow @tradecraftfarms
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Henry Catchpole)
